FragilityCurve.Description: Costing to be furnished by user. Consequence data assumes 16 SF of damage area.
FragilityCurve.Name: Electronic equipment on wall mount brackets
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data. Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence. ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Replace equipment. User must supply replacement cost.
